title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible to do so. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible to do so. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: I expect to be able to select any item in the library outline view for the first time without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
